mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def reduce_array(arr):
    (n, m, k) = arr.shape
    arr_2d = np.reshape(arr, (n / m, k))
    sums = np.sum(arr_2d, axis=1)
    indices = np.lexsort((arr_2d[:, 0], sums))
    return arr_2d[indices]

    return arr_2d[indices]

import numpy as np

def reduce_array(arr):
    (n, m, k) = arr.shape
    arr_2d = np.reshape(arr, (n * m, k))
    sums = np.sum(arr_2d, axis=1)
    indices = np.lexsort((arr_2d[:, 1], sums))
    return arr_2d[indices]
